name: Which Anime Came First? Anime Quiz!
name_original: Which Anime Came First? Anime Quiz!
description:
Which Anime Came First? is a quiz app where you are asked which of the two anime shown is older. The objective is to answer correctly consecutively the maximum number of times possible.

There are two game modes! Normal Mode and Timer Mode, which is a bit more challenging!

Do you know all the animes and when they came out? Prove yourself!
